TaxonIdentification.species_authority: (Pallas ex Pursh) G. L. Nesom & G. I. Baird

treatment.description: Plants mostly 20–60 cm. Stems grayish to white, leafy, loosely tomentose. Leaves grayish green to white; blades 1-nerved, narrowly linear, 10–50 × 1–1.5 mm, faces loosely tomentose. Involucres 7–10.5 mm. Phyllaries 10–18, apices erect, mostly obtuse, abaxial faces tomentose, sometimes sparingly. Corollas 6.5–9 mm, tubes usually puberulent, rarely arachnose, lobes 1–2 mm, glabrous; style appendages longer than stigmatic portions. Cypselae densely hairy; pappi 5.2–7.2 mm. 2n = 18.
